EmailTemplate.name: Claim Amount Approved - Internal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.RecordType} - Amount has been approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The claim amount of {!Case.Claim_Amount__c} has been approved, you may now service the ticket as needed.
Thank you,
Beam Suntory Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
